channel.title: Items Fix
channel.description: Can some one tell me what i have to open in my source to change the prices of Items

item.title: Items Fix
item.dc:creator: @leonscape leonscape
item.description:
@leonscape wrote:

[quote=“TheLetterQArousesMe, post:4, topic:430621”][quote author=leonscape link=topic=533296.msg3898396#msg3898396 date=1327532793]

What server base? PI, Delta, Hyperion, etc.

Its a atabbingscape source im not good with all the different types of servers lol
[/quote]
It’s an Alstar-scape base (czar?) - Go to item.cfg, look up the id like item = 0 then it should look like
item = (ID) (PRICE1) (PRICE2) (PRICE3) (STATS) change all 3 of the (PRICEnumber) to the same price, say your price is 500000 on each one (500K) and you want it to be say 2.5M, you would change all of them to 2500000. Then next time you value them in a shop or alch them they’ll be 2.5m[/quote]

There isent a item.cfg ??!??

Read full topic

item.title: Items Fix
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“leonscape, post:3, topic:430621”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=533296.msg3898380#msg3898380 date=1327532082]
What server base? PI, Delta, Hyperion, etc.
[/quote]
Its a atabbingscape source im not good with all the different types of servers lol[/quote]
It’s an Alstar-scape base (czar?) - Go to item.cfg, look up the id like item = 0 then it should look like
item = (ID) (PRICE1) (PRICE2) (PRICE3) (STATS) change all 3 of the (PRICEnumber) to the same price, say your price is 500000 on each one (500K) and you want it to be say 2.5M, you would change all of them to 2500000. Then next time you value them in a shop or alch them they’ll be 2.5m

Read full topic
